# scam.surf — Surfing & Water Sports Scam Database

> Community-powered database of surfing & water sports scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the surfing & water sports industry.


scam.surf is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the surfing & water sports industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Surfing & Water Sports scam database and community reports](https://scam.surf)


## Keywords

surfing & water sports scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.surf
